1.0.name: wordpress/search-keyword-tracker
1.0.description:
Search keyword tracker is a simple and useful plugin, which allows you to view the keywords that are being searched bu the visitors in your WordPress website, as well as keywords those bring traffic from different search engines to your website. It supports all major search engines like Google, Yahoo, Bing, Ask.com. You can optimize your contents to get high traffic by the help of this plugin

The plugin is easy to use. To open the plugins dashboard, just click on Keyword Tracker menu item in the admins menu. You can view the results for different durations such as Day, Month, Year and All Time. The repeated keywords will be combined and the repeat count will be incremented.
You can the sort any column in acending or decending order by clicking on its title. To remove entries, just click on corresponding checkboxs and finally click on Delete Selected button.
